Generation V.Black: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
Generation V.White: It conceals itself from enemy eyes by creating many small ice particles and hiding among them.
Generation V.Black 2: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
Generation V.White 2: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.

Generation VI.X: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
Generation VI.Y: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.

Generation VII.Sun: Hot days cause its body to melt. It can be restored by refreezing it, but the process leaves its body slightly warped.
Generation VII.Moon: This Pokémon has existed since the Ice Age. It controls particles of ice, freezes its opponents, and then shatters them with a headbutt.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It sprays its enemies with grains of ice to freeze them. Most Vanillish in Alola are smaller than average.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: This hearty Pokémon survived the Ice Age. It's incredibly popular in very hot regions.

Generation VIII.Sword: By drinking pure water, it grows its icy body. This Pokémon can be hard to find on days with warm, sunny weather.
Generation VIII.Shield: It blasts enemies with cold air reaching −148 degrees Fahrenheit , freezing them solid. But it spares their lives afterward—it's a kind Pokémon.

Generation VII.Moon: Mount Lanakila ( SOS Battle while hailing )
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Mount Lanakila ( SOS Battle while hailing )
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Mount Lanakila ( SOS Battle while hailing )
